headline: Dollar Tree (DLTR) Rallied Following the Divestiture of Its Family Dollar Business
summary: The London Company, an investment management company, released its fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter for its “The London Company Mid Cap Strategy”. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In Q4 2025, US equities posted the third consecutive quarter of higher returns, with the Russell 3000 Index rising 2.4%. The market highlighted how investors […]

headline: Rothschild Sets $165 Target on Dollar Tree (DLTR) as Rating Moves to Buy
summary: We recently published an article titled 12 Best Retail Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On February 17, Dollar Tree, Inc. (NASDAQ:DLTR) was upgraded to Buy from Neutral by Rothschild & Co Redburn, which established a $165 price target. Earlier, on February 3, Evercore ISI analyst Michael Montani reduced the firm’s price target to $160 […]

headline: Dollar Tree Pushes Into Wealthier US ZIP Codes
summary: Dollar Tree Inc. (NASDAQ:DLTR) is trading its bargain basement reputation for a piece of the high-earner economy with its pivot toward locating in affluent neighborhoods. The discount retailer opened its 9,000th North American store in May in Plano, Texas, at...
